summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Sixth Avenue Northwest from West Forty-fifth Street to West Sixty-seventh Street; Fourth Avenue Northwest and Fifth Avenue Northwest, each from West Fifty-fifth Street to West Sixty-seventh Street; West Fifty-fifth Street from Fourth Avenue Northwest to Eighth Avenue Northwest; West Fifty-first Street and West Fifty-second Street, each from Third Avenue Northwest to Eighth Avenue Northwest, and West Sixty-fifth Street from Fourth Avenue Northwest to Sixth Avenue Northwest, by laying water mains, together with hydrants, tees, crosses and other necessary appurtenances for water service and fire protection, in accordance with Resolution No. 519 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
